name: Beyond the Wall
description: A great survival simulator set behind the wall! A game following the best traditions of roguelike games based on one of the most famous story of our time. Hold out in the frost as long as possible while avoiding the walking dead.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
